name: BIMSY DREAMS
description:
Welcome to the world of BIMSY DREAMS, a collection of wacky microgames that could only be deamt up by someone as tired as Bimsy.

BIMSY DREAMS was made for LOWREZJAM2021, so it's in 64x64 resolution!

    

The game features 45 microgames across 3 stages, plus two different remix modes to challenge your reflexes!

Come and play with Bimsy, won't you?
